forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
